channel.title: site.com - News
channel.description: All news about European football. Generic news, match previews, match reports and much more.

item.title: U19 EURO: Croatia v France live
item.description: England know anything other than a Croatia win would book their semi-final place while a France victory would end their opponents' hopes. Follow the action in our MatchCentre.

item.title: Champions League group stage sides' transfers
item.description: Next season's UEFA Champions League group stage teams have been busy plotting their bids ahead of the new campaign. Keep track of every deal in our round-up.
